channel.title: [Delta]Object second click
channel.description:
Is their a case for this in Deltascape? Or will I have to make one myself. By second click I mean like prospecting, where you have to click the second option on an object.
Please help me, I really need to figure this out as soon as possible.

item.title: [Delta]Object second click
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“Oh-Noes, post:2, topic:440770”]It’s case 252. Most deltas should already have it, but in-case you don’t:

case 252: //Second object option objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA(); objectY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); objectX = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); break; [/quote]
Thanks
rep++

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Object second click
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

It’s case 252. Most deltas should already have it, but in-case you don’t:

case 252: //Second object option objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA(); objectY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); objectX = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); break;
